text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Beuningen | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = Beuningen (Gld, NL) town hall.JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = Beuningen town hall | image_flag = Beuningen flag.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Beuningen wapen.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0209 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Beuningen in a municipal map of Gelderland | map_caption = Location in Gelderland | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Netherlands | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Gelderland | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 9 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = Beuninger | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 6550–6551, 6640–6645 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 024, 0487 | website = | footnotes = }} Beuningen () is a municipality and a town in the eastern Netherlands. It is near the city of Nijmegen. The river Waal is to the north. The other towns in the municipality are: Ewijk, Weurt, and Winssen. There is a restored windmill in the town, De Haag. title: Beuningen
